revised_title: Election of Fellows and Society News
tldr: This article from the Notes and Records of the Royal Society of London in 1940 discusses the election of new fellows, various society events and news, and updates on the library. Notable members include William Thomas Astbury, Gavin Rylands de Beer, and Alister Clavering Hardy. The article also mentions the amalgamation of Italian academies, the return of the society's offices to Burlington House, and the maintenance of obituary notices for fellows.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies and Book Reviews
